additional_notes: The document is a memorandum from the U.S. Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Prisons, regarding the death of inmate Jeffery Edward Epstein. The document contains redacted names and has a stamp from the Department of Justice. The death was reported as a suicide, and an autopsy was ordered.
